title: Mount Hideaway Mysteries: Exes and Oh No's

sources.title: Mount Hideaway Mysteries: Exes and Oh No's | Full Movie | Mystery Crime
sources.description:
Bethany Shanholtz, a beautiful young government operative, moves back to her rural Virginia hometown to get away from the spy life. But townspeople start getting murdered and her government bosses convince her to investigate, unofficially. She's not allowed to use agency resources so she calls upon friends from her childhood as a home-schooled farm girl. The investigation quickly leads to Bethany's ex-boyfriend Jamie and the mystery surrounding his sister's mysterious death many years ago. The closer Bethany gets to the answers, the more the murders seem to be related to her own past - and the town's future.
2018.  Stars: Mikayla Leybovich, Stacey Bradshaw, Trevor Stevie Ray Ontiveros

sources.title: Mount Hideaway Mysteries (2018) Moving back home... Can be Murder - 4K
sources.description:
From the bestselling "Mount Hideaway Mysteries" novels. When Bethany investigates murders threatening her hometown and a secret government facility. Family secrets start climbing faster than Hector’s hacking skills, she and Dr. Amy must decode lies before the town’s gossip avalanche buries them—but Jamie’s charm and Tina’s meddling might just crash the system first.
Is her ex-boyfriend the killer?

Original title: Mount Hideaway Mysteries: Exes and Oh No's  

Director: Brett Monk  
Writers: Brett Monk, Mikayla I. Leybovich  

Main cast:  
Mikayla I. Leybovich - Bethany Shanholtz  
Stacey Bradshaw - Dr. Amy Bradford  
Trevor Stevie Ray Ontiveros - Hector the Hacker  
Joshua Cody - Jamie Wood  
Suzanne R. Neff - Tina Shanholtz  

Genres: Crime, Drama, Mystery, Romance,  
Release date: December 8, 2018
Filming location: Virginia, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
